name: Coffee And You
content: This is the first project since i started studying at Mindx Technology School. It's a website selling coffee, because it's the first project, so I don't have much experience and knowledge, so the website is mainly used HTML CSS and Javascript basis.
feature: Purchase, pay, view cart, login as admin to add products to the store, view orders and bestsellers (Username: admin@@, Pass: admin123)

name: Nextflix
content: This is the second project since i started studying at Mindx Technology School. It's a movie watching website with an interface cloned by Netflix. UI using ReactJS, styled Components, Bootstrap 5. Database using Firebase (Database, Authentication, Realtime Database, Storage, Hosting)
feature: Signup, authentication email, signin, add profile, edit profile, watch video, show watched videos for each profile

name: Blog Medium
content: This is a blog site used to post introductory or review blog posts, with a simple design interface. UI using NextJS, Tailwind CSS, Typescript. Database using Sanity CMS
feature: Use sanity CMS to update content and add articles, (https://blog-tech.sanity.studio/desk) this is the CMS server because I use my github account to login so I can't provide :(

name: My Portfolio
content: This site I completed it as a simple app to introduce myself and summarize the products that I have worked on since I started studying IT until now and the skills I have acquired. Website is used HTML, CSS, NextJS, SCSS, Typescript and JSON server
